p: In the open field test of locomotor activity, the mice were separated into four groups containing five mice in each. The dosing of each group was carried out as described in anxiolytic section. After dosing, each mouse was placed into a four-sided box of 25 equivalent black and white coloured squares with dimensions of 60 × 60 × 60 cm 3, for 3 min at 0, 30, 60, 90 and 120 min intervals and the movements were recorded [ 46].
